author: Reuters Editorial
title: REFILE-BRIEF-ZTE Says Will Delay 2018 Q1 Report Release Date
text:
(Refiles to add more bullet points, link)
April 25 (Reuters) - ZTE Corp:
* SAYS IT WILL DELAY 2018 Q1 REPORT RELEASE DATE * SAYS COMPANYâ€™S MANAGEMENT HAS DECIDED TO TAKE CERTAIN ACTIONS OVER U.S. BAN ON SALES
* SAYS A-SHARE TRADE REMAINS SUSPENDED
* SAYS IT WILL HOLD SHAREHOLDERS MEETING ON MAY 11 IN ITS SHENZHEN HEADQUARTER Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2HYxJWf ; bit.ly/2qWBOmD Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
